summary: The Legend of Followers is of a short storyline for a group of followers I’ve uploaded.
descriptionHtml:
This book can be found in several places throughout Skyrim and will reward you with a skill for reading it. It’s Value will also reward you if you chose to sell it.
Other places this book may be found is as follows:
Winhelm : Hjerim , Kitchen Table
Riften: Honeyside, Kitchen Table
College of Winterhold: Arcanaeum, on the Desk of Urag Gro-Shub
Markarth: Vlindrel Hall, placed on a nearby Bookshelf
Falkreath: DeadMans Drink, placed on a nearby barrel
Morthal: Moorside Inn, placed on a nearby Barrel
Solitude: Proudspire Manor, placed on the Arcane Enchanter
Whiterun: Breezehome, placed on the Dining room Table
Dawnstar: Dawnstar Santuary, placed on the table in the fireplace room near the secret entrance
author: chaz373
